component.name: MultiScope
component.summary: Play any game from your Steam library in splitscreen or with multiple monitors.

description.p: MultiScope is an open-source tool for Linux/SteamOS that allows you to create and manage multiple instances of `gamescope` and `steam` simultaneously. This enables multiple players to enjoy their game library on a single computer, either in split-screen mode or each with their own display, along with dedicated audio output and input devices.

ul.li: Simple Multi-Instance Management: Run multiple Steam instances simultaneously.
Per-Instance Hardware Assignment: Assign specific mice, keyboards, and controllers to each game instance.
Dedicated Audio Channels: Route audio from each game instance to a separate audio output device.
Separate Home Directory: Customize settings and files for each instance individually.
Shared Game Library: Share the Steam game directory among multiple instances.
Use Any Proton: Use any version of Proton to run your games.

description.p: This is the first stable version of MultiScope, now with Flatpak and AppImage support.
